law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 6, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 118, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 307, sec. 1, effective April 9, 1992 -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 56, sec. 1. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1954.

metadata.lrc-note: (6/25/2013). In subsection (24) of this statute, the list of KRS sections has been corrected. During the 2013 Regular Session of the General Assembly, the amendments to the Model State Code of Military Justice appeared in House Bill 362 and House Bill 167. The section numbers in these bills changed several times when alternative versions of the bills were introduced, but some of the internal references in subsection (24) of this statute (2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 6) were inadvertently not corrected to correspond to those changes. Under the authority of KRS 7.136(1), the Reviser of Statutes has corrected those references to match the list that appears in Article 1(a)(14) of the Model State Code of Military Justice.
